page.title: 11GUISELEY RUGBY CLUB
page.content: There's only one{Rugby Club}in Yeadon. It is called{Guiseley}Rangers.Fourteen boys from school are in the club.We meet at the Green Lane Cricket Club on {Sundays}for matches,and practise near the common during the week.Most of the teams we play are in the Leeds area but we went to{Barrow}for a match.Our league is called the Yorkshire League, and our club has teams for under 9,11 13,15 and senior.Our colours are green and white hoops.There are trophies at the end of the season for most improved player,most tries,best tackler and{Player of the Year.}Boys from our school won all the trophies this year.The club has an old bus to take us to matches.To help pay for it we sometimes do{sponsored runs.}We run 20 times round Green Lane Cricket pitch.{BY MARK CAMP AND MARK TREWARTHA
